unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
noInternet: No internet connection. Some features may not work.
noInternetConnection: You're offline. Please check your internet connection.
failedToChangeLanguage: Failed to change language. Please try again.
loginFailed: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please check your credentials and try again.
logoutFailed: Failed to log out. Please try again.
accountLocked: Account locked. Try again later or contact the system administrator at support@example.com.
userDuplication: A user with this email already exists. Please use a different email.
userNotCreated: The user account could not be created due to an unexpected error. Please try again later.
emailNotFound: No account is associated with this email address. Please check your email or sign up for a new account.
passwordInvalid: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again or reset your password if you've forgotten it.
passwordMismatch: Password and confirm password do not match.
unauthorizedAccess: You are not authorized to access this resource. Please log in with the correct credentials.
highlightVerse: You must highlight verse to update your last reading progress.
highlightSingleVerseOnly: You can only update a progress with a single verse. Please highlight only one verse before updating your progress.
passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 4 characters long.
invalidOrExpiredToken: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
sessionExpired: Session expired, please log in again
sessionNotExist: Session No more exist, please log in again
noOldPasswordFound: No old password has been found, contact system admin to resolve your login via support@amen24.org
progressNotFound: No progress data found. Please start reading to create your first progress.
progressExceedLimit: You have reached the maximum number of progresses allowed.
verseGroupFavorited: This verse group is already in your favorites.
verseGroupFeatured: This verse group is already featured.
glossaryNotFound: The requested glossary term was not found.
glossaryMissingTerm: You must provide the term in all supported languages.
